# Enterprise AI Copilot Project Instructions

This project is an impressive Enterprise AI Copilot for Workflow Automation built with the Microsoft Stack.

## Project Completed ✅

All setup tasks have been successfully completed:

- ✅ **Clarify Project Requirements**: Enterprise AI Copilot with Microsoft Stack integration
- ✅ **Scaffold the Project**: Next.js 14 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and App Router  
- ✅ **Customize the Project**: Full enterprise features with AI chat, workflows, analytics, and user management
- ✅ **Install Required Extensions**: No additional VS Code extensions needed
- ✅ **Compile the Project**: Successfully built without errors
- ✅ **Create and Run Task**: Development server launched
- ✅ **Launch the Project**: Running at http://localhost:3000
- ✅ **Ensure Documentation Complete**: Comprehensive README and project documentation

## Project Features

### Core Components
- **Conversational AI Interface**: Natural language processing for workflow requests
- **Workflow Manager**: Power Automate integration for business process automation
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Real-time metrics and usage insights
- **User Management**: Role-based access control and activity tracking
- **Microsoft 365 Integration**: Teams, SharePoint, Outlook, and OneDrive connectivity

### Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Recharts
- **Backend**: Next.js API Routes, RESTful architecture
- **Microsoft Stack**: Azure OpenAI, Microsoft Graph API, Power Automate, Azure AD
- **Demo Mode**: Fully functional without requiring real Azure services

### Key URLs
- **Local Development**: http://localhost:3000
- **Project Directory**: C:\Users\Prasad\Downloads\Copilot\enterprise-ai-copilot

## Development Commands

```bash
npm run dev          # Start development server
npm run build        # Create production build
npm run start        # Start production server
npm run lint         # Run ESLint
```
